pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
